name: Bolt (itch) (Lucas LEPLAT)
description:
Bolt is a prototype I created in a couple days, as I wanted to try some FX/Shader interaction with gameplay.

Theme : Only One Button.

I will probably improve the gameplay as soon as I find a way to fix Unity's collisions with high speed objects.

As it is currently, the gameplay is pretty simple :

You can start aiming (and slowing time) by holding LMB, and as soon as you release the input, you dash towards the cursor, consuming energy.

You regenerate energy over time and when colliding with non lethal walls. Colliding with anything red kills you.
